summary: With this mod you can summon 14 Pairs of Horses (28 horses in all). The DLC Dawnguard is required.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Dual Summon Horses[/size][/color][/b] [color=#00ff00]Version 2.0[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Fr.[/color]


With this mod you can summon 14 Pairs of Horses (28 horses in all). The DLC Dawnguard is required.


A: Black and Black and White Horses

B: Brown and Grey Horses

C: Saddled Palomino and Palomino Horses

D: Saddled Black and Saddled Brown Horses

E: Shadowmere and Arvak

F: Saddled Grey and Saddled Black and White Horses

G: 2 Spectral Horses (Storm/Simple)

H: 2 Spectral Horses (Frost/Fire)

I: Armored Demon and Armored Shadowmere

J: Daedric Armored and Long Armored

K: Dragonbone Armored and Ebony Armored

L: Armored Dwemer Horse and Dwemer Horse

M: Elthrai Armored and Sethai Armored

N: Leather Armored and Nordic Armored

[color=#ff0000] [b]And if you want to be accompanied by a companion, it is possible with the mod [/b] [/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13530/?] Horse Branding by fLokii [/url] (Easily mark any mount for followers to ride)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/COz7j75.gif[/img]

To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the 14 “Spell tome: Two Horses XX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Dual Summon Horses"

In order to buy the 15 books at Farengar, you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=849255Farengar20.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/849255Farengar20.jpg[/img][/url]

CREDITS

[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba[/color] for the meshes and the textures of the horses (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000] newermind43[/color] for the mesh of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14596 ]Skeleton Demonic Horse [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh[/color] for Daedric/Dwemer/Nordic/Dragonbone Armored Horses in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13348/?] Horse Armors for Skyrim [/url] (“feel free to use in your mods, just give credits”) and [color=#ff0000] Christian Paskota [/color] for Elthrai/Sethai Armored Horses in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38548/?] Sethai and Elthrai Horse Armors [/url] ("Asset use permission”: "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")


[color=#ff0000]Razorpony[/color] for the Dwemer Horse in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33321]Dwemer Steam Horse [/url]("Free modders resource" and "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")
author: gg77
